# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates an immutable typed buffer pointer referencing the same memory as the given mutable buffer pointer.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ other: UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<Element>)
```

## Parameters

- **other**: The mutable buffer pointer to convert.
title: init(_:)
